name: harmonic-universe

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.frontend:prod: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.build: echo "Building root project" && cd frontend && npm install --no-save vite @vitejs/plugin-react react react-dom && mkdir -p src && echo "export function jsx(t,p,k){return{type:t,props:p,key:k}}; export function jsxs(t,p,k){return jsx(t,p,k)}; export const Fragment=Symbol('Fragment'); export default {jsx,jsxs,Fragment};" > src/jsx-runtime-fallback.js && mkdir -p node_modules/react && ln -sf ../../src/jsx-runtime-fallback.js node_modules/react/jsx-runtime.js && VITE_FORCE_INCLUDE_ALL=true npx vite build

description: A web application for creating and exploring musical universes
